name: searxng
description: SearXNG is a metasearch engine. Users are neither tracked nor profiled.
full_description:
------------------------------------------------------------------------

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/searxng/searxng/master/src/brand/searxng.svg)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Privacy-respecting, hackable [metasearch
engine](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Metasearch_engine)

If you are looking for running instances, ready to use, then visit
[searx.space](https://searx.space). Otherwise jump to the
[user](https://docs.searxng.org/user),
[admin](https://docs.searxng.org/admin) and
[developer](https://docs.searxng.org/dev) handbooks you will find on our
[homepage](https://docs.searxng.org/).

# Contact

Come join us if you have questions or just want to chat about SearXNG.

### Matrix

[#searxng:matrix.org](https://matrix.to/#/#searxng:matrix.org)

### IRC

[#searxng on libera.chat](https://web.libera.chat/?channel=#searxng)
    which is bridged to Matrix.

# Differences to searx

SearXNG is a fork of [searx](https://github.com/searx/searx). Here are
some of the changes:

## User experience

-   Huge update of the simple theme:
    -   usable on desktop, tablet and mobile
    -   light and dark versions (you can choose in the preferences)
    -   support right-to-left languages
    -   [see the screenshots](https://dev.searxng.org/screenshots.html)
-   the translations are up to date, you can contribute on
    [Weblate](https://weblate.bubu1.eu/projects/searxng/searxng/)
-   the preferences page has been updated:
    -   you can see which engines are reliable or not
    -   engines are grouped inside each tab
    -   each engine has a description
-   thanks to the anonymous metrics, it is easier to report a bug of an
    engine and thus engines get fixed more quickly
    -   if you don\'t want any metrics to be recorded, you can [disable
        them on the
        server](https://docs.searxng.org/admin/engines/settings.html#general)
-   administrator can [block and/or replace the URLs in the search
    results](https://github.com/searxng/searxng/blob/5c1c0817c3996c5670a545d05831d234d21e6217/searx/settings.yml#L191-L199)

## Setup

-   you don\'t need [Morty](https://github.com/asciimoo/morty) to proxy
    the images even on a public instance
-   you don\'t need [Filtron](https://github.com/searxng/filtron) to
    block bots, we implemented the builtin
    [limiter](https://docs.searxng.org/src/searx.plugins.limiter.html)
-   you get a well maintained [Docker
    image](https://github.com/searxng/searxng-docker), now also built
    for ARM64 and ARM/v7 architectures
-   alternatively we have up to date installation scripts

## Contributing is easier

-   readable debug log
-   contributions to the themes are made easier, check out our
    [Development
    Quickstart](https://docs.searxng.org/dev/quickstart.html) guide
-   a lot of code cleanup and bug fixes
-   the dependencies are up to date

# Translations

We need translators, suggestions are welcome at
<https://weblate.bubu1.eu/projects/searxng/searxng/>

![](https://weblate.bubu1.eu/widgets/searxng/-/multi-auto.svg)

# Make a donation

You can support the SearXNG project by clicking on the donation page:
<https://docs.searxng.org/donate.html>
